overview: Frontend script for a healthcare digital experience site providing interactive UI behaviors such as theme toggling, smooth scrolling, filtering, sorting, FAQ accordion, tabs, and analytics logging.
interactions: Click theme toggle to switch between light/dark mode
Anchor clicks perform smooth scroll to target
Navbar highlights active link based on current route
Typing in search input filters cards after debounce
Clicking filter chips toggles active filters
Clicking FAQ buttons expands/collapses panels and persists state
Clicking tab buttons switches visible panel
data_flow: LocalStorage used for theme and FAQ open state persistence
Search input value and activeFilters array drive card visibility
filterAndSortCards reads DOM attributes (data-title, data-description, data-tags, data-popularity)
Analytics events logged to window.analyticsLog via logEvent()
accessibility: ARIA attributes: aria-hidden, aria-current, aria-pressed, aria-expanded, aria-selected
Focus management on smooth scroll targets
Reduced motion respected via prefers-reduced-motion media query
Keyboard accessibility implied for buttons and links
test_ideas: Verify theme toggle updates data-theme and persists across reloads
Ensure back-to-top button visibility toggles correctly on scroll
Validate smooth scroll behavior and focus management for anchor links
Confirm navbar highlights correct active link per route
Test search debounce timing and card filtering accuracy
Check filter chip toggling updates aria-pressed and activeFilters array
Validate sort dropdown changes reorder cards correctly
Ensure FAQ accordion allows only one open item and persists state
Verify tab switching updates aria-selected and panel visibility
Confirm analyticsLog entries are created for each interaction
